item.title: Adium 1.0a18
item.description:
Fixed Sparkle (we hope).

Important: Do not install this update unless you have started Adium with the shift key down. The bug that this version fixes is that you can't install an update with a connection active (on most services). So, have no accounts connected when you install this update.

If you have already begun to connect, simply click “Remind me Later&”, then quit Adium and relaunch it with the shift key down.

With any future version, you should be able to update even when connected. That's the bug we fixed in this version.
